title: dms-exchange-specification (dxs) export-archive metadata description
description: This schema defines metadata for the export

version.description: Valid version for this export and containers. All metadata files from the containers (meta.json) have to match this version, otherwise the container is invalid.

exportBy.description: User who has triggered the export.

tsExport.description: Timestamp when the export was performed.

numberOfDocuments.description: The number of documents in this archive. Optional, since depending on the export-process this might not be known in advance.
